name: Triplight
description:
A third person rhythm game, play to the rhythm of songs and beat your score!

Created in 9 hours, Triplight was made for a student game jam. The requirements were that it needed to be a rhythm game, have a single level that changes and have particles.

Credits

Martyn Evans - Creator

Attributions

"Vortal Combat" by Kelly Bailey, Valve Corporation.

"Sector Sweep " by Kelly Bailey, Valve Corporation.
